name: The Semen Donation Truck!
description:
Warning: Game contains sexual content. Game closes automatically upon completion.
Approximate game length: ~15 minutes

Sexual content:
- Totally happy and consensual sexual intercourse
- Depiction of semen
- X Ray/Cross-Section view of gentials

Synopsis:
A family father is walking down a dim lit street. It was supposed to be a quick pick-up gig for medicine but a halted truck on that street changes everything.
Two succubus invite you to donate your semen using the condoms they provide. If you beat their record in the Whack-O-Mole minigame, they also gladly provide physical help in your endeavor at donating.
